infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Pocket Caddie AI needs camera access to record your golf swing for analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Pocket Caddie AI needs photo library access to select swing videos for analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Pocket Caddie AI needs microphone access when recording swing videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Pocket Caddie AI to access your camera to record swing videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Pocket Caddie AI to access your photos to select swing videos.
